description: After an ally heals an enemy, the enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}. After an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} {ACTION_casts} a healing spell (other than [icons,1972]Words of Encouragement), this creature {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Words of Encouragement on them.
name: Round of Applause
